fertilizer_tip.en: Apply fertilizer at the vegetative stage
fertilizer_tip.es: Aplicar fertilizante en la etapa vegetativa.
fertilizer_tip.sw: Weka mbolea katika hatua ya mimea
fertilizer_tip.ha: Aiwatar da taki a matakin ciyayi
fertilizer_tip.tn: Tshela monontsha mo kgatong ya go mela
fertilizer_tip.wo: Defal fertilisan bi ci jamonoy gàñcax
fertilizer_tip.bm: Aw bɛ bagaji kɛ jirituru waati la
fertilizer_tip.ts: Chela manyoro eka xiteji xa swimilani

harvest_info.en: The harvest will take place in 3 weeks
harvest_info.es: La cosecha se realizará en 3 semanas.
harvest_info.fr: La récolte aura lieu dans 3 semaines
harvest_info.ha: Za a yi girbi a cikin makonni 3
harvest_info.yo: Ikore yoo waye ni ọsẹ mẹta
harvest_info.ig: Owuwe ihe ubi ga-ewere ọnọdụ n'ime izu atọ
harvest_info.tn: Thobo e tla diragala mo dibekeng tse 3
harvest_info.st: Kotulo e tla etsahala ka mor'a libeke tse 3
harvest_info.wo: Góob bi dina am ci ñatti ayu-bis
harvest_info.bm: Suman tigɛ bɛna kɛ dɔgɔkun 3 kɔnɔ
harvest_info.ts: Ntshovelo wuta endleka endzhaku ka 3 wa mavhiki
